amendment.description: To clarify the obligation of certain producers and handlers of mild to Federal order pools, to apply minimum milk price requirements to certain handlers of Class I milk products in the Arizona-Las Vegas marketing area under certain circumstances, and to exclude Nevada from Federal milk marketing orders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 143 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 143 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S1439-1440) To clarify the obligation of certain producers and handlers of mild to Federal order pools, to apply minimum milk price requirements to certain handlers of Class I milk products in the Arizona-Las Vegas marketing area under certain circumstances, and to exclude Nevada from Federal milk marketing orders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 143 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 143 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid.
